This is what Tom and I fixed for I200411040800 (part to of fix for bug 77729).

The interesting question is: why did beginRule fail?

> The interesting question is: why did beginRule fail?

Exactly - Christof was able to reproduce by quickly manipulating and saving
files, so I guess that in some situations the reference provider tried to access
the file while it was being used. 

Marking as fixed > 20041104

will add a comment to bug 77640

Steps to reproduce:
1. enable quick diff and compare with version on disk
2. open a file
3. add some changes
4. quickly hit Ctrl+S, Ctrl+F4

traces.message: Attempted to beginRule: L/org.eclipse.text/p rojection/org/eclipse/jface/text2/IRepairableDocument.java, does not match outer  scope rule: L/org.eclipse.text/projection/org/eclipse/jface/text2/ISlaveDocumen tManager.java
